name: Lost In A Weird Place
description:
Lost In a Weird Place is the 2nd E.P released in 2008 from Grand Disaster and features some of the best and most popular tracks to date. The album artwork is by Grand Disaster too!!!!!

1.The Dream of You and I
2.Im Only Young Now
3.Dont Runaway
4.Leave
5.Last Song

name: Ryan Turner-Thinking of You
description:
The self proclaimed 'masterpiece' by Ryan Turner before he moved to Grand Disaster music. Recorded in 2006 it is the only LP made by Ryan to be available for sale. Contains the following tracks.

1.Lost
2.The World Is Turning
3.Here and Near
4.Oh, No
5.Happy
6.I Will Love The Same
7.Dan
8.Through Your Window
9.Streets of Paradise
10.Thinking of You
11.What Do You Want

name: The Letter and The Bridge
description:
The Letter and The Bridge. A novella by Ryan Sam Turner.

A tragic, touching and sometimes amusing love story about a young couple plagued by alcohol, drugs, depression and anxiety.

After one fateful evening Ray decides the best thing to do is to flea town in the hope that Lorna will forgive him in time. 
He begins writing her letters as he struggles to move on with his life but finds it all too hard. 
She on the other hand is finding life better and is the happiest she has ever been.

That is until Feb 14th comes along and Ray decides to come back to town for one last try to win her back.


Available May 15th. WILL POST ASAP!!!!!!

LIMITED NUMBER AVAILABLE AT THE MOMENT BUT MORE ARE ON THE WAY. 
IF YOU MISS OUT ON THE FIRST BATCH WE WILL SHIP OUT AS SOON AS WE CAN.

name: No One Left To Visit
description:
No One Left To Visit
The 2nd Novella from Ryan Sam Turner

Described by Simone Felice (Author/Musician) as 'Beautiful Work'

Stan is a grieving OAP who has recently lost his wife to cancer and he is struggling to come to terms with the fact that he will never see her again. 
To try and deal with things, Stan hits the bottle and hard! After years of sobriety he is back on the sauce and finds himself in a bad place. After surprisingly being saved one night by the unlikliest of sources he get's into a strange friendship which brings solace and then eventually sadness, but will Stan be okay?

Out Now!
